document_data.image: [[Image:Mythdrannorcover.jpg|250px|The cover of Ruins of Myth Drannor]]
document_data.title: The Ruins of Myth Drannor
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Ruins of Myth Drannor''''' is a 2{{nd}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' box set for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''.
{{Quote|'''''[[Myth Drannor|MYTH DRANNOR]]''', city of glory. We shall not see its like again.''

'''''PERHAPS YOU'VE HEARD ITS SHINING STORY'''...of a time when [[elves]] and [[dwarves]], [[gnome]]s and [[halfling]]s and [[human|men]] lived and loved together, striving to create beauty and right wrongs. Magic was brighter then, in the City of Song. Folk were richer then, in the City of Wonder. Once this proud city stood as the highest jewel in the glittering crown of civilization.''

'''''THERE CAME A DAY''' when it was overwhelmed by evil, thrown down, despoiled, and left a ruin in the heart of its encircling wood, as all things of beauty are. Evil spawned and crawled there, and the elves kept watch around it, that evil might not spread. Centuries passed, but the tales let few forget the powerful magic, the great treasure – and the deadly horrors that lay waiting within its walls. Now the elves are gone, and adventurers from a hundred lands and cities are rushing to Myth Drannor, to seize what they can of the long-lost glory. If the [[bard]]s and sages are right, power lies there for the claiming that could change the face of the Realms, rule kingdoms or lay waste to them.''

''If you would be a part of this exciting quest, this boxed set is for you. Inside await four poster maps, eight cardsheets, eight MONSTROUS COMPENDIUM sheets, and two booklets – a 128-page Campaign Guide, and a 32-page Adventure Booklet – filled with details about Myth Drannor, a fully-detailed campaign setting for high-level characters in the world of the ''Forgotten Realms''. New monsters and magical items await to sparkle and challenge in any AD&D campaign – and this set lays bare the secret at the heart of Myth Drannor: the fabled [[mythal]]!''

''Don't be left by the fireside, listening, wistful and poor. Join the rush for gems and gold, magic and power! Open this box, and enter into fabled Myth Drannor!''}}
document_data.Contents:
The box contains:
* 128-page ''Myth Drannor Campaign Guide''
* 32-page ''Myth Drannor Adventures'' booklet
* 4 maps
* 8 monster cards
* 8 cardstock accesory sheets

;Myth Drannor Campaign Guide
* Introduction
* The High History of Myth Drannor
* The Seizing
* The Encircling Wood
* Myth Drannor Today
* The Mythal
* Wild Mythal Magic Table
* The Phaerimm
* Phaerimm Spells
* The Alhoon
* Alhoon Spells
* The Baatezu
* The Baelnorn
* Adventuring Bands
* The Presence of Lathander
* Lathanderian Priest Spells
* The Nagara
* Druth Daern
* The Spell-tome of Daern
* Shaundakul, Rider of the Winds
* NPCs of Myth Drannor
* The Magic of Myth Drannor

;Myth Drannor Adventures
* Running Adventures in Myth Drannor
* The Crown of Stars
* The Wyrm Below
* What We Face in Dreams
* A Harp at Sunset
* The Arm of Valor
* Myth Drannor Encounter Tables
* Encircling Wood Encounter Tables
* Myth Drannor Feature Tables
* Myth Drannor Treasure Tables

;Cardstock reference sheets
* Key to the Map of Myth Drannor as It Was
* Dragondark Tower
* The Llundlath
* The Neirdrecrypt
* The Thelaeneum
* Windsong Tower
* Mythal Magic Table
* Ruins Rubble Table

==== Monster Cards ====

* Aratha ("Killer Beetle") and Baelnorn
* Blazing Bones and Doomsphere (Ghost Beholder)
* Dread and Feystag (Calygraunt)
* Electrum Dragon (Draco Magus Electrum) and Fang Dragon (Draco Dentus Terribilis)
* Lythlyx and Magebane
* Metalmaster (Sword Slug) and Naga, Bone
* Ormyrr and Windghost
* Xantravar (Stinging Horror) and Xaver
